(Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.) {2}{U}, {T}: Detain another target creature you control with mana value 3 or less. Create a token copy of that creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Disgraced Sparkhand
card.text: Ward {2} Blue and/or black spells you cast cost {X} less to cast, where X is the number of Rogues you control that dealt combat damage to an opponent this turn.

card.name: Summoning Game
card.text: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a creature card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Mob Enforcer
card.text: Menace, trample Pay 2 life: Untap this creature and put a +1/+1 counter on it. Activate only once each turn as a sorcery.

card.name: Savani Voidrose
card.text: Masquerade {B}, Pay 2 life (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward—Sacrifice a permanent. Turn it face up any time for its masquerade cost.) When this creature is turned face up, draw two cards. Whenever another permanent you control is turned face up, each opponent mills two cards.

card.name: Keeper of Gerell Necropolis
card.text: Hexproof from White and from Blue and from Red At the beginning of your end step, if a creature with toughness greater than its power dealt combat damage to an opponent this turn, create a 1/2 black Bird creature token with flying. {B}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Depraved Oracle
card.text: Masquerade {BR} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward—Sacrifice a permanent. Turn it face up any time for its masquerade cost.) Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, you may pay that much life. If you do, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Wroszy's Gravedigger
card.text: When this creature enters, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you do, you lose life equal to that card's mana value. If nonblack, noncolorless mana was spent to cast this spell, you may return a nonland permanent card this way instead.

card.name: Ashiok's Judgment
card.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles a card from their hand."

card.name: Annihilating Aura
card.text: Choose target creature. Each other creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is that creature's power.

card.name: Mastermind Nekosyth
card.text: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may play that card, and spend mana as though it were any color to do so. A spell cast this way has practiced. (That spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you've attacked with this turn.)

card.name: Righteous Longfang
card.text: When this creature enters, you may put an equipment card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield. Equipped creatures you control get +1/+1 and have trample.

card.name: Tamer of Giants
card.text: Haste {2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Leytower's Shattering
card.text: Choose one. You may choose another for each spell an opponent cast this turn — • Target artifact loses indestructible until end of turn. Destroy it. • Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target. • Discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.

card.name: Sachal's Betrayal
card.text: Practiced (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you've attacked with this turn.) This spell deals 7 damage to each battle, creature, planeswalker and player. Each player discards their hand and draws 3 cards. Each player sacrifices 2 nonbasic lands.

card.name: Tensionwire Balance
card.text: Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, put a distraction counter on this enchantment, then this enchantment deals 1 damage to that player. Whenever you attack with a creature, you may remove a distraction counter from this enchantment. If you do, discard a card, then draw a card. At the beginning of your end step, if there are 5 or more distraction counters on this enchantment, sacrifice it.

card.name: Glorious Parade
card.text: Practiced (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you've attacked with this turn.) Trample When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you attacked with this turn.

card.name: Kara of the Red Ribbons
card.text: Trample, vigilance Whenever another attacking creature you control with toughness greater than its power dies, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Kara, where X is that creature's toughness.

card.name: Subject 1951
card.text: If you would gain life, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on this creature instead.

card.name: Gemrai, Unphased
card.text: Vigilance Gemrai, Unphased gets +1/+1 for each Aura attached to her. {T}: Add X green mana, where X is the number of Auras attached to Gemrai, Unphased.

card.name: Pelina Driue
card.text: Whenever you scry, you gain 1 life for each card you looked at while scrying this way. {G}{U}: Scry 1, then put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Primal Communion
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Until end of turn, play with the top card of your library revealed, and you may play creatures, enchantments and lands from the top of your library."

card.name: Blessings of the Martyr Queen
card.text: When this enchantment enters, put a creature card with mana value 7 or less from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Skuyla, Last of the Vhalkiri
card.text: Flying, vigilance, hexproof from black When Skuyla enters, create Grinli, a legendary 3/3 white Cat creature token. Whenever a creature you control named Grinli dies, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Mariltia's Inner Despair
card.text: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on target permanent. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice this enchantment. If you do, and you have exactly 1 life, you win the game.

card.name: Leycore Defenses
card.text: Kicker {R} Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a permanent you control. Then if this spell was kicked, it deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Morau and Jemel
card.text: Whenever this creature enters or attacks, scry 2. If you've scried this turn, you may draw a card instead. When this permanent leaves the battlefield, you may detain target creature or planeswalker. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

card.name: Azania Voidrose
card.text: Masquerade—{WB}{WB} (You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward—Sacrifice a permanent. Turn it face up any time for its masquerade cost.) When this creature enters or is turned face up, return a non-legendary creature card with Masquerade or Morph from your graveyard to the battlefield face up or face down. Put a lifelink counter on that creature and Azania.

card.name: Arbiter's Gavel
Nightmares on Tour
card.text: Put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn, and must attack this turn if able. Until end of turn, counter all triggered abilities of that creature.

card.name: Guidance of the Extinct
card.text: Destroy up to one target enchantment. Return up to one enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand. Untap all creatures you control. Put two +1/+1 counters on target permanent.

card.name: Tagdron's Call
card.text: Search your library for a green creature card with mana value X or less, where X is one plus the highest mana value among creatures that died under your control this turn, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Maren, FCD Chief
card.text: The first time you cast a noncreature spell each turn, choose one — • Detain target nonland permanent. (Until your next turn, that permanent can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.) • Put a +1/+1 counter on another creature you control.

card.name: Mob Boss
card.text: Other Rogues you control get +1/+1. {1}{UB}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black and blue Rogue creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Filigree Acrobat
card.text: Nontoken creatures you control have haste. {1}{B}{R}{R}, Pay X life, sacrifice this creature: Untap X target creatures you control. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Mistress of Cats
card.text: Haste When this creature enters, create a 2/2 red Cat creature token. {T}: The next creature spell you cast this turn has practiced. (That spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you've attacked with this turn.)

card.name: Heroes' Assembly
card.text: Whenever an enchantment enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. Then if that enchantment is an Aura, scry 1. Enchanted creatures and enchantment creatures you control have lifelink.

card.name: Progression of Needles
card.text: Whenever an opponent sacrifices a permanent, you gain 1 life. Whenever you sacrifice a nontoken permanent or turn a permanent face up, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Leycore Transformer
card.text: You may cast spells as though they had flash. Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, this artifact deals 2 damage to any target. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Sir Gremor, the Steadfast
card.text: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. The first time each turn a creature you control with toughness greater than its power deals combat damage to an opponent, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Eyrik, Wroszy's Right Hand
card.text: Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Equip abilities you activate {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana. Equipped creatures you control have vigilance.

card.name: Jhan, Committed Investigator
card.text: The first time you scry each turn, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn. {1}{U}, {T}: Scry 2, then create a Treasure token.

card.name: Shield Charm
card.text: Choose up to two. • Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. • Untap up to one target nonland permanent. • Detain target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.) • You gain 3 life.

card.name: Rikh, Don of the Scales
card.text: Whenever a permanent Rikh dealt damage to this turn dies, create two tapped Treasure tokens. {1}{U}{B}: Return target Rogue card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Bloodbath Harlequin
card.text: Practiced (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you've attacked with this turn.) Haste At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, draw two cards, then discard a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Riwaya, Bound Deity
card.text: Practiced (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you've attacked with this turn.) Trample, vigilance {2}{R}{G}, Discard this card: Create two 1/1 red and green Mercenary creature tokens.

card.name: Sudden Power-up
card.text: Search your graveyard and/or library for up to two Aura cards and put them onto the battlefield attached to a permanent you control. Then shuffle. That permanent can't attack this turn.

card.name: Ezuki, Savani's Consort
card.text: Ward—Exile a card from your hand Performer spells you cast and face-down creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever you turn another permanent face up, put a +1/+1 counter on Ezuki, Savani's Consort and gain 2 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.text: Whenever you scry, put that many charge counters on this. {G}{G}{U}, {T}: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample and hexproof until end of turn. Activate only if there are 10 or more charge counters on this artifact.
